title: David Haye in fresh jibe at 'moronic' Tony Bellew fans - 'bet all of your dole money on him'
text:

David Haye has made another derogatory remark about Tony Bellew fans as the tension builds ahead of their heavyweight showdown. 
Haye is in hot water after branding Bellew's supporters "f retards" during Monday's press conference. 
Depite facing a hefty fine from the boxing authorities, Haye has refused to apologise and maintains he was the subject of racist abuse. 
And following Thursday's open workout session, he aimed another jibe at the Liverpudlian's following. 
Asked about the alleged racist abuse, Haye said: "There was a few. There wasn't a lot but there was more than there needed to be. David Haye during the workout (Photo: PA) David Haye poses during his workout (Photo: REUTERS) David Haye during his workout (Photo: REUTERS) 
"It was a bunch of idiots. I didn't enjoy that but that's what he brings to the table. 
"He is mixed race himself. I don't think his crew realise his background." 
Haye went on to take aim at Bellew's fans, insinuating the majority were without a job. Tony Bellew in action (Photo: Getty) Haye and Bellew during the press conference (Photo: REUTERS) 
"They are morons. I don't want to spend much more time focusing about them. 
"Get them to bet all of their dole money on Tony Bellew to win the fight, if they are so confident."
